origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.get_synthetic_financial_assessment', 'description': 'This function provides a synthetic financial assessment of a cryptocurrency based on recent research articles, historical data, and real-time market data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency to assess.'}, {'name': 'numRecentArticles', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of recent research articles to consider.'}, {'name': 'historicalDate', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The date for historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format.'}, {'name': 'needRealTimeData', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include real-time market data in the assessment.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'syntheticAssessment', 'description': 'The synthetic financial assessment of the cryptocurrency.'}, {'name': 'cryptoCode', 'description': 'The code of the cryptocurrency.'}, {'name': 'analysisSuggestions', 'description': 'Suggestions for further synthetic analysis.'}]}请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.get_synthetic_financial_assessment, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoName'是'UMA', 'numRecentArticles'是'3', 'historicalDate'是'2027-05-01', 'needRealTimeData'是'true'.
